checks.title: Public entry exposes buyer onboarding start
Account creation/sign-in yields buyer workspace access
Buyer terms acknowledgement is explicit and persisted before checkout
checks.details: Explicit persisted buyer-terms acknowledgement not found (checkbox=true, link=true, persisted=false)

checks.title: Payment and escrow transitions are observable across buyer/admin surfaces
Buyer evidence visibility and role gating are enforced
Admin oversight and replay evidence are deterministic for buyer order lifecycle
checks.details: adminExecutive=true, adminShipmentReplay=false, buyerDelivered=false, buyerSettled=false, unauthRoleGating=true, adminLedger=200
